title: OAV Balangir Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Various PGT Post
description: Odisha Adarsha Vidyalaya (OAV), Balangir, has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Post Graduate Teacher Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation, B.Ed. can grab this chance and apply for the OAV Balangir Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given belo...
